Welcome to the Internet.

We reverse everything you say.

welcome to this weeks deep shit analysis
1st the obvious things:
average attack = 4.6 | average defense = 5.4 | average ability = 6 | average difficulty = 4.7 | average ip = 3480(remebers me of the ibm 3480)
we have 3 fighters(all male),3 mages,2 marksman,1 tank and 1 support
80% male and only 20% female
now the real stuff:only 2 of the champs are female and both end with the letter "a" - we have 2 champs that start with the letter "g" both male - we have 2 champs that their 2nd letter and their 3rd is the same and both are friends - with the last name of mages and fighters you can spell(without changing the order) "sraero" = which is a actual instagram account and a name of a ltd.,it can also be related to"sr aero" engineering - 60% of the champ passive are related to time - 3 of the champs name are made out of 5 letters (all male) - morgana is the only chamos that her 2nd name doesnt start with "the"
there are a few more dat i will post if they are wanted

1){{champion:74}}>{{champion:5}}>{{champion:72}}>{{champion:25}}>{{champion:13}}>{{champion:429}}>{{champion:42}}>{{champion:201}}>{{champion:79}}>{{champion:3}} 

2)[{league+of+legends}-{o}]=b+c+g+g+h+k+m+r+s+x(the 1st name of all the champs) 

3){{champion:3}} + {{champion:42}} = 100


4)if u want to make a an account with the word morgana in it add a "69" in somewhere in it.

5)riot is recommending you to have a skarner as jung,a morg as mid and a gragas as top(try to figure why).
